requests.noLeaveRequests: There are no leave requests yet.
requests.revokeTooltip: Revoke leave request. Subject of approval.
requests.noRequestsToApprove: There are no leave requests to decide on.
requests.deductedFromAllowance: Days would be deducted from allowance

allowanceBreakdown.title: Allowance breakdown
allowanceBreakdown.help: This is explanation how we get the total allowance. Hover on each number to get details what does one mean.
allowanceBreakdown.nominalHelp: Allowance derived from department current user belongs to.
allowanceBreakdown.carriedOverHelp: Allowance carried over from previous year. Note: this amount is calculated on the very first day of the year.
allowanceBreakdown.individualAdjustmentHelp: Adjustment to allowance done by admin user.
allowanceBreakdown.employmentRangeHelp: Automatic adjustment to allowance based on employee's start and end day of employment.
allowanceBreakdown.usedSoFarHelp: Number of days already taken from allowance.
allowanceBreakdown.lockedSoFarHelp: Number of unavailable days in allowance due to accrual nature of vacation entitlement.

absences.usedSoFarPopover: {{name}} in current year used {{days}} days from allowance
absences.remainingPopover: {{name}} in current year has {{days}} remaining days in allowance
absences.daysAvailableForYear: Days available for {{name}} to take this year
absences.accruedHelp: The way of available allowance calculation is defined on department level.
absences.groupedByType: Absences used this year grouped by leave types
absences.carriedOver: Allowance carried over from previous year
absences.carriedOverHelp: Allowance adjustment based on unused holidays from previous year.
absences.carriedOverHelpSecond: It is calculated at the beginning of current year.
absences.adjustmentHelp: Tune allowance for this user in current year.
absences.adjustmentHelpThird: The value is valid during current year. Next year it needs to be re-confirmed.

schedule.moveToCompanyWide: Move employee to company wide schedule

feeds.title: My feeds
feeds.subtitle: Feeds for external calendars
feeds.description: Share your TimeOff.Management data with external calendar providers such as Microsoft Outlook, Apple Calendar (iCal) or Google Calendar.
feeds.myCalendarDescription: page - feeds all data from My Calendar page
feeds.teamViewDescription: page - feeds Team view data for current month
feeds.exportHint: To export particular feed into default calendar application just click on corresponding link.
feeds.copyHint: Otherwise copy the link location and pass it to external application.

leaveWarnings.missingMinimumBlock: Reminder: in {{year}} you still need to schedule at least {{days}} consecutive days of {{leaveType}}.
leaveWarnings.managerMissingMinimumBlock: Employee has not yet scheduled at least {{days}} consecutive days of {{leaveType}} in {{year}}.

userDetails.emailHelp: Email address used by this user
userDetails.departmentHelp: Department current user is part of.
userDetails.autoApproveHelp: Set the flag ON to streamline leave requests from {{name}} directly into Approved state.
userDetails.endDateHelpAccess: After this date user is not able to access the company.
userDetails.endDateHelpDeactivate: This is a way of deactivating user accounts.
userDetails.ldapEnabled: is enabled, so that password does not matter.
userDetails.passwordUpdate: It is possible to update password for given account.

userDetails.deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete the user {{name}} {{lastname}}?

register.title: New company
register.subtitle: Register new company account and supervisor user

home.title: TimeOff management
home.subtitle: Open source Staff Time off management for companies of all sizes.

features.departmentsDescription: Create departments to group employees, each one has its own manager.
features.leaveTypesDescription: Holidays, Sickness, Maternity, Paternity, Working from home etc. In addition configure whether a type uses vacation allowance or not.
features.calendarIntegrationDescription: Broadcast employees whereabout into calendars: Outlook, Gmail. (Work in progess)
features.publicHolidaysDescription: Setup public holidays as well as company specific dates.
features.workflowDescription: Employee requests a leave, manager says yes or no.

integrationApi.title: Integration API (beta)
integrationApi.subtitle: Configure access to account data via integration API
integrationApi.description: TimeOff.Management supports sharing {{company}}'s data to other software via REST API.
integrationApi.toggleDisable: This page allows you to disable access.
integrationApi.toggleEnable: This page allows you to enable access.
integrationApi.tokenHelp: Token that allows access to {{company}}'s data.

emails.requesterAllowance: This year {{name}} has taken {{taken}} days from holiday allowance. While {{available}} days are still available.

forgotPassword.followLink: Please follow the link below to proceed:
forgotPassword.manualLink: Alternatively copy and paste the following link into your browser:

addNewUser.body: {{admin}} just registered new account for you as an employee of {{company}}.
addNewUser.passwordContact: Please contact {{admin}} about your new password and login at
addNewUser.alternative: Alternatively follow the link below to set a new password

confirmRegistration.subject: Confirm registration on TimeOff.Management
confirmRegistration.body: To complete your registration process in TimeOff.Management please click on the following link:

leaveRequest.sentTo: Your leave request was sent to {{approver}}
leaveRequest.followUp: There will be another email upon decision.
leaveRequest.autoApproved: Your new leave was added and auto approved
leaveRequest.subjectAutoApprovedSupervisor: New leave was added and auto approved.
leaveRequest.noApprovalNeeded: There is no need to approve/reject leaves from {{requester}}.

leaveDecisionSupervisor.subject: Leave request decision is made
leaveDecisionSupervisor.body: You just processed a decision for {{requester}}: to {{action}}

leaveRevoke.sentTo: Your leave request cancellation was sent to {{approver}}
leaveRevoke.subject: Revoke leave request
leaveRevoke.subjectAutoApproved: Leave was revoked and auto approved
leaveRevoke.noAction: There is no need to perform any actions regarding this leave.

teamView.title: Team View
teamView.exportTitle: Export Team View to external calendars

userAdd.title: New employee
userAdd.subtitle: Adding new employee account
userAdd.autoApproveHelp: Set the flag ON to streamline leave requests from this employee directly into Approved state.

usersImport.title: Employees bulk import
usersImport.subtitle: Quick employees import
usersImport.stepsTitle: Do it in three simple steps
usersImport.stepOneText: Download example of .CSV file based on employees currently available:
usersImport.sampleHelp: The sample file contains information about employees who are already in the system. Extend the file to have records about new employees and upload it using the form on left hand side.
usersImport.stepTwoText: Amend .CSV file to contain new employees details.

leaveTypeModal.title: Add new leave type
leaveTypeModal.useAllowanceHelp: If checked leaves of this type are going to be counted towards employee's annual holiday allowance.
leaveTypeModal.autoApproveHelp: If checked leaves of this type will not require supervisor approval.
leaveTypeModal.pickColor: Pick a color for the new type
leaveTypeModal.pickColorHelp: Determine how leaves of new type are going to be highlighted on Calendar/Team view pages.
leaveTypeModal.limitHelp: If set to non-zero value determines maximum number of days of new leave type each employee could take during the year.
leaveTypeModal.minimumConsecutiveHelp: If set, employees should have at least one leave request of this type for the specified number of consecutive days within a calendar year.

generalSettings.title: General settings
generalSettings.subtitle: Account main settings
generalSettings.carriedOverDaysHelp: Number of days in employee allowance that are carried over to the next year.
generalSettings.shareAbsencesHelp: If enabled all employees can see information about everybody's absences regardless departments.
generalSettings.hideTeamViewLabel: Hide Team View page for non-admin users
generalSettings.hideTeamViewHelp: If marked Team view page is shown only to admin users.
generalSettings.backupHelp: Download the full list of employees with all their leave requests. The file is in .CSV format which is compatible with MS Excel.
generalSettings.companyWeekScheduleHelp: Define company wide weekly schedule. Press correspondent button to toggle working/non-working day.
generalSettings.carryOverTitle: Calculate and carry over unused allowance
generalSettings.carryOverHelpFirst: This action will carry over unused allowance for each employee from {{yearPrev}} to the current year, {{yearCurrent}}.
generalSettings.carryOverHelpSecond: Please note, employees allowance is going to be updated.
generalSettings.leaveTypeNameHelp: Tick one to always be on top of the list
generalSettings.removeCompanyNameHelp: Please type in the name of the company you wish to remove.
generalSettings.removeCompanyHelp: Completely erase data associated with {{company}}'s account.

departments.title: Departments
departments.criticalHelp: Select employees that are critical for operations. Overlap limits apply to them.
departments.overlapHelp: Maximum number of critical employees allowed to have overlapping leave at the same time.
departments.accruedAllowanceHelp: If set to YES, holiday allowance starts to build up - or accrue - from the first day of employment. It accrues in proportion to the annual entitlement. E.g. an employee in the ninth month of employment would have built up 9/12ths (or three-quarters) of annual entitlement.
departments.publicHolidaysHelp: If set to YES, employees from department have Bank Holidays added on top of their allowance
departments.secondarySupervisorsHelp: List of users who also could decide on leave requests from {{department}} department's employees.
departments.noAvailableSupervisors: No employees available to be added as secondary supervisors.

ldapAuth.title: LDAP authentication
ldapAuth.subtitle: LDAP authentication details
ldapAuth.descriptionParagraph1: TimeOff.Management supports LDAP authentication for customers that want to integrate the application with the rest of their infrastructure. The obvious reason is to allow employees to reuse their Active directory credentials in TimeOff.Management.
ldapAuth.descriptionParagraph2: This page allows you to setup the TimeOff.Management to communicate with a custom LDAP server.
ldapAuth.descriptionParagraph3: Please note that employees have to use their LDAP email with LDAP password (rather than username). This is due to the multi-tenant nature of TimeOff.Management application that allows hosting more than one company within a single installation.
ldapAuth.descriptionParagraph4: Form below has placeholders with examples how to setup TimeOff.Management to use free test LDAP server described
ldapAuth.urlHelp: The URL must contain the protocol and port parts
ldapAuth.allowUnauthorizedCert: Allow unauthorized SSL certificate (if LDAPS is used)
ldapAuth.bindCredentialsHelp: Password used for dealing with LDAP queries
ldapAuth.adminPasswordNoticePrefix: In order to prevent a situation where a company account locks itself out, the current administrator (
ldapAuth.adminPasswordNoticeSuffix: ) has to enter the password associated with her/his email on the LDAP server.
ldapAuth.adminPasswordNoticeSecondSuffix: can login into TimeOff.Management with new LDAP settings.
